long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Password generator is a simple extension to generate passwords on the fly by simply clicking the extension icon. By default the generator will generate a password mixing uppercase, lowercase, and numbers. You can choose to change the length, add or remove numbers, and add or remove symbols. Your last chosen settings will be remembered next time you open the extension as well.
